scripts.users:debug: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=users --http-debug dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.users:smoke: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=users -e profile=smoke dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.users:load: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=users -e profile=load dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.users:stress: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=users -e profile=stress dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.users:soak: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=users -e profile=soak dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.availability:debug: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=availability --http-debug dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.availability:smoke: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=availability -e profile=smoke dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.availability:load: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=availability -e profile=load dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.availability:stress: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=availability -e profile=stress dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.availability:soak: npm run build; k6 run -e scenario=availability -e profile=soak dist/app.bundle.js
